mapper.sql: SELECT inventory_quality_id, check_date, remark, username, array_to_string(issues::text[], ',') AS issues FROM inventory_quality
mapper.select: WHERE inventory_id = #{inventory_id} ORDER BY check_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inventory_quality ( inventory_id, remark, username, check_date, issues ) VALUES ( #{inventory.id}, #{remark}, #{username}, #{date}, string_to_array(#{issues}, ',')::issue[] )
